verses.text: \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Pharao \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w thrust|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*.

Therefore thou shalt \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3627"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* neighbour, \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* favour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Pharao’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w At|strong="H3068"\w* midnight \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* enter \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Pharao \w who|strong="H0834"\w* sitteth \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* first born \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* handmaid \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mill, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* hereafter.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* least noise, \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H0834"\w* wonderful \w a|strong="H0834"\w* difference \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* maketh \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* thou, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* under thee: \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* Pharao exceeding angry. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: Pharao \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* signs \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* done \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* written, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Pharao. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* Pharao’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
